content.raw:
OK, the tutorials seem to be working fine. I also tested placing the WAMV at \(0,0\) and moved the pinger to \(0,10\), \(10,0\), \(-10,0\) and \(0,-10\) using ros pub messages. Rviz shows the pinger is functioning as expected:

`rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 0 10 0`

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/212481175-0_10_0_web.png)
‌

```
rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 10 0 0
```

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/4007448383-10_0_0_web.png)
‌

```
rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 0 -10 0
```

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3215346260-0_-10_0_web.png)
‌

```
rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- -10 0 0
```

‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3931691358--10_0_0_web.png)
‌
content.html:
OK, the tutorials seem to be working fine. I also tested placing the WAMV at (0,0) and moved the pinger to (0,10), (10,0), (-10,0) and (0,-10) using ros pub messages. Rviz shows the pinger is functioning as expected:

rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 0 10 0

‌

rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 10 0 0

‌

rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- 0 -10 0

‌

rostopic pub -r 10 /wamv/sensors/pingers/pinger/set_pinger_position geometry_msgs/Vector3 -- -10 0 0

‌

‌
